carpet.rule.shadowItemMode.extra.0: UNLINK -> default vanilla ( will also disable the mod )
carpet.rule.shadowItemMode.extra.1: PERSIST -> shadow items will survive unloading
carpet.rule.shadowItemMode.extra.2: VANISH -> shadow items will disappear if unloaded
Reintroduce pre 1.19 shadow item generation by update suppression
DISCLAIMER: this will not reintroduce old update suppression
carpet.rule.shadowCraftingGeneration.des: Introduce a crafting recipe to create new Shadow Items
carpet.rule.shadowCraftingGeneration.ext: combine any item stack and a EnderChest to generate a new shadow stack
the operation will consume 1 item from each component
WARNING: do not move the items with SHIFT
WARNING: do not close the GUI with a shadow stack in the crafting grid
carpet.rule.shadowItemTooltip.desc: Show Shadow Items Id in Item Names
carpet.rule.shadowItemInventoryFragility: Prevent Unlinking Shadow Items on base inventory movements
carpet.rule.shadowItemTransferFragilityF: Prevent Unlinking Shadow Items on hopper-dropper item transfers
carpet.rule.shadowItemUpdateFix.desc: Shadow Items will produce inventory updates
carpet.rule.shadowItemPreventCombine.des: Prevent Merging any Shadow Item on base inventory movements
carpet.rule.shadowItemUseFix.desc: Prevents desync between client and server when using a fast refilling shadow stack
